ygData.authorName: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4
ygData.from: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] testing
ygData.msgSnippet: I would have to disagree with you.  If I had to guess, I would say most bards DO choose a diety to worship.  I would also guess that Bristlebane is the most
ygData.messageBody:
I would have to disagree with you. If I had to guess, I would say most
bards DO choose a diety to worship. I would also guess that Bristlebane is
the most common choice. There was a polling thread on the Concert Hall a
long time ago asking everyone who they worshipped and IIRC Bristlebane was
the most common response.

Galtin of E'ci
Bristlebane bard

-----Original Message-----
From: Heather [mailto:earthwicca@...]
Sent: Sunday, January 07, 2001 7:59 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] testing


Most usually are agnostic, though, but where's the challenging fun in that.
:)

Willowlark Stormsynger
21st Bardess
Karana Server

Shada, 58 Bard
